titles.title: Medicare Cost Contract Extension Act of 2011
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to extend for 3 years reasonable cost contracts under Medicare.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 8/2/2011--Introduced. Medicare Cost Contract Extension Act of 2011 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to extend through December 31, 2015, the indefinite extendability or renewability of Medicare reasonable cost reimbursement contracts.
